name: Extreme OffRoad Truck Hero 3D
description:
Truck Hero 3D brings for you the ultimate challenging and fun drive on zig zag tracks of dangerous hilly areas.

Hey !! Trucks Drivers Fans what are you waiting for?? Do you need to upgrade your simulation games?? YES!! Then you must try the best Hero Truck simulation game. Hero Truck 3D driving game brings for you the Best ultimate fun and challenging hero truck driving game. Choose your best Hero truck and deliver sensitive and costly cargo wooden boxes and goods crates to a destination as fast as you can. Hurdles can stop your Hero truck so be careful from hurdles while Driving your hero truck. Drive fast but carefully because you can crash your hero truck and lose all of your costly cargo on this dangerous hilly mountain area.
Finish all levels to become the best Hero truck driver, only few people can complete this hard and challenging game! Are you ready to become the champion of Hero Truck Driver? Push your endurance, skills and speed to the limit and become the best truck driver!!

Hero Truck 3D Game features:
- Realistic graphics and physics
- Three awesome Hero Trucks
- Smooth and easy controls
- 15 levels to complete
- Challenging Missions
- Different costly cargo to deliver
-Map guidance
-Different goods to travel

If you are looking for the most advanced truck simulator for mobile phones and tablets, look no further. Play Truck Hero 3D now!
